statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE flagged = true;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE flagged = true AND account_id = 123 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 456
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 10
SELECT transaction_id, TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(timestamp, WEEK) AS week_start FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 789 ORDER BY week_start ASC
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions ORDER BY flagged_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flagged_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM high_risk_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, flagged FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE AND transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE flagged = FALSE AND transaction_date <= '2022-01-01'
SELECT flagged_id, transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions ORDER BY flagged_date ASC
SELECT flagged_id, transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flag_reason ILIKE '%fraud%'
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, flagged, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT flagger_id, flag_timestamp FROM flagged_transaction_logs WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT reason, flag_timestamp FROM flagged_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions JOIN flagged_transaction_logs ON flagged_transactions.transaction_id = flagged_transaction_logs.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE flagged = true;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM flags ORDER BY flagged_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT flag_id, flagged_date, reason FROM flags WHERE flagged_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT action_type, table_name, record_id, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT owner_name, account_type FROM accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id, flagged FROM transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE AND amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, flagged FROM transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_date, t.amount, th.notes FROM transaction_history th JOIN transactions t ON th.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;

SELECT a.owner_name, t.amount, h.transaction_date FROM accounts a JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id JOIN transaction_history h ON t.transaction_id = h.transaction_id WHERE a.account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, f.flag_name, ft.flagged_date FROM transactions t JOIN flagged_transactions ft ON t.transaction_id = ft.transaction_id JOIN flags f ON ft.flag_id = f.flag_id;
